ticket.title: metaclass attribute inheritance
ticket.original-body:
The current implementation of `Object#metaclass` in ActiveSupport doesn't respect inheritable attributes, e.g.:
@@@ ruby class Foo class_inheritable_accessor :bar end
Foo.bar = 'baz' Foo.new.bar # => 'baz' Foo.new.metaclass.bar # => nil @@@
The attached patch adds this behavior.
